It's also important to consider cultural sensitivity. In a diverse society, people often participate in various religious practices. Still, pointing out a religious symbol in a public setting could be seen as intrusive or disrespectful, depending on the context.

The person who wrote the post might be in the wrong because their comment, even if not intended to offend, did cause offense.
